ComicInfo.Title: Remote Control Car; Things That Annoy Us the Most; Sell It Back!; The Cracked TV Watchers Guide to Small Screen Etiquette; The Cracked Money Diet; Translating Technical Talk; You Know You've Got Big Problems When...; You Know You're a MTV Freak When...; Career Guide for Obnoxious Kids; Don't You Hate It on Your Birthday...; If the A-A-Ayy Team Was Made Less Violent
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Hudd and Dini try to steal the guard's keys with a remote control car but the guard catches their toy with a remote control police car.
Native Americans kill a group of Cavalry soldiers then sell their goods to another group from the Cavalry.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:40:13. [Issue ID 250571]
